title: A Mutually Beneficial Arrangement
description: Rowan Phillips is a woman on a mission to provide the best she can for the community served by the Cartwright Center. When things look bleak, a mysterious benefactor steps in with an offer that could be a win-win situation... or a catch-22.  This started - and finished - as a serial on the auhtor's blog. If you read it there, there is NOTHING new here.
author: Christina C. Jones
